product_name: Seattle Sports Puffer Jug Water Container - Special Buy
long_description: Flexible yet strong, the Seattle Sports Puffer Jug water container puffs up to carry up to 2 gallons of water and collapses flat when empty for low-profile storage after camping or backpacking. Polyethylene stays rigid when in use, allowing the jug to retain its shape; built-in handle makes transport from creek to campsite a cinch. Spigot cap unscrews for easy filling, cleaning and dispensing. Special buy.
short_description: Flexible yet strong, the Seattle Sports Puffer Jug water container puffs up to carry up to 2 gallons of water and collapses flat when empty for low-profile storage after camping or backpacking.
